QuestData.Title: Aiding the Accord: Dragonbane Keep
QuestData.Description:
Our allies once again seek your assistance as our efforts continue across the Isles. Words within the walls of Valdrakken whisper a resounding comfort knowing your efforts have helped shape our future.
Now then, to business.
A lingering djaradin threat moves upon the Waking Shores deep within the smoldering inferno of Dragonbane Keep. We must move to disrupt their advances.
We await your return, $n.
QuestData.LogDescription: Travel to The Waking Shores and lay siege to Dragonbane Keep. Continue your efforts in aiding the Valdrakken Accord and their allies throughout the Dragon Isles.
